title: USD Alumnus Mike Brown ('93) Named New York Knicks Head Coach - University of San Diego Athletics
snippet: Men's Basketball July 10, 2025 · NEW YORK – University of San Diego alumnus Mike Brown (’93) was named the head coach of one of the NBA’s most storied franchises, the New York Knicks on Monday, July 7. Brown played for the Toreros Men’s ...

title: List of New York Knicks head coaches - Wikipedia
snippet: Tom Thibodeau was the Knicks head coach from 2020 to 2025.

title: Mike Brown (basketball, born 1970) - Wikipedia
snippet: On July 7, 2025, the New York Knicks hired Brown as their new head coach.

title: Tom Thibodeau - Wikipedia
snippet: He was head coach of the Minnesota Timberwolves from 2016 to 2019, before becoming the Knicks' head coach. He won the Coach of the Year award again in 2021 after leading the Knicks to their first playoff berth in eight seasons. In 2025, he led the Knicks to their first conference finals appearance in 25 years, and was fired at the end of the season.
